definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: After the tanker was hijacked lost contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 油轮遭劫持后与外界失去联系。

sentences.english: The result is that sortie rates will be low, with a "huge tanker demand."
sentences.chinese: 结果就是，有了“巨大的油轮需求”，出动率低下。

sentences.english: In a massive explosion, card and tin unseeing tanker sank to the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 在巨大的爆炸声中，卡锡惨叫着和油轮沉入了海底。

sentences.english: China's most ambitious undertaking is a new deep-sea port for oil tankers.
sentences.chinese: 中国最野心勃勃的事业是一个新建的油轮深海港口。

sentences.english: Charters of oil-tankers may be by time or for voyage.
sentences.chinese: 油轮的租赁费可以按时间或航程计价。

sentences.english: Messrs. McMahon and Inkster are also using oil-tanker tracking data.
sentences.chinese: 迈克马洪和英科斯特也在使用油轮跟踪数据。

sentences.english: The liner is reported to have been in collision with an oil tanker.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，这艘客轮与一艘油轮相撞。

sentences.english: The oil tanker ran aground on a sandbank.
sentences.chinese: 这艘油轮在一个沙洲上搁浅了。

sentences.english: Portuguese warship thwarts hijack off Somalia on an oil tanker.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙战舰成功挫败索马里海盗劫持油轮。

sentences.english: Special tugs now usher tankers in and out of Valdez to the open sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在，进出瓦尔迪兹港的油轮由特别的拖船引导。

sentences.english: By 1894, the Samuels were supplying kerosene to Shanghai in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 1894年，森默兄弟已用散装油轮运送煤油到上海。

sentences.english: Simulation has been used only anti-ship cruise missiles against a super tanker.
sentences.chinese: 只是曾经模拟过使用反舰巡航导弹打击一艘超大油轮。

sentences.english: The oil tanker landed at the harbour at 3 p.m.
He did return, and today huge vessels and gigantic tankers are ferrying into the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 如今巨大的船只和油轮在海上渡运。

sentences.english: A further five cruises will use Shanghai as a home port in the next five years.
sentences.chinese: 在未来五年时间里，又将有五艘油轮入籍上海港。

definition: tugboat/boat towed by a tugboat/to tow a boat
